price: 116. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Haddaad joojin oo aadan ka harin(ku baaqaaga Towxiidka) Nuuxow! Waxaad ka mid noqon kuwa la dhagaxyeeyo.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
